name: PublishSymbols
description: Index your source code and publish symbols to a file share
helpMarkDown:
Index your source code and publish symbols to a file share
[More Information](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=613722)
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: SymbolsPath
inputs.label: Path to publish symbols
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to the symbol store share.  If this value is not set, source indexing will occur but symbols will not be published.

inputs.name: SearchPattern
inputs.label: Search pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: The pattern used to discover the pdb files to publish.

inputs.name: SymbolsFolder
inputs.label: Path to symbols folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the folder that is searched for symbol files.  The default is the configured source folder.

inputs.name: SkipIndexing
inputs.label: Skip indexing
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether to skip injecting source server information into the PDB files.

inputs.name: TreatNotIndexedAsWarning
inputs.label: Warn if not indexed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether to warn if sources are not indexed for a PDB file. Otherwise the messages are logged as normal output.

inputs.name: SymbolsMaximumWaitTime
inputs.label: Max wait time (min)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of minutes to wait before failing the step

inputs.name: SymbolsProduct
inputs.label: Product
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the product parameter to symstore.exe.  The default is $(Build.DefinitionName)

inputs.name: SymbolsVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the version parameter to symstore.exe.  The default is $(Build.BuildNumber)

inputs.name: SymbolsArtifactName
inputs.label: Artifact name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the artifact name to use for the Symbols artifact.  The default is Symbols_$(BuildConfiguration)
